CustomField.formula:
IF ( ISPICKVAL( Preferred_Country__c ,'USA'),
HYPERLINK("http://www.salesforce.com", "Click here for USA partner website"),
HYPERLINK("http://www.intelogik.com", "Click here for Non-USA partner website"))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Dear user, please click here for partner website
CustomField.label: Link To Partner Website
